short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides functionality to store and restore tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
User can store and restore the all tab URLs in browser storage. Even the browser is closed, user shall be able to restore the tabs.

Your data is synced across your all devices.

Features:
1. Store multiple backups of your browser tabs. (Example: Based on search of your dream car comparison and videos)
2. Label your backups
3. Clear the backup with a single click
